TopicTitle: Star Systems mod for KSP 1.0? and possible Bugfix for Kerbal Galaxy

Articles.Content:
I had a question about the Star Systems mod. I was wondering if someone made a version of Star Systems that works with Ksp 1.0 and not something that will literally bug my game to hell like Kerbal Galaxy because i tried that it gave me The Purple and black checkers on kerbin and gave me black on the KSC. Please help me

Edit: realized my Kerbal galaxy was out of date

Edited August 5, 2015 by Starslinger999
noticed why i saw bugs
